title: Unknown Sign Font - any help appreciated! :)
content:

Font: 

 Regency Script

author: jonnorman43

comments.content:
It looks like **Regency Script**.  
There is a digital version called **Regency Script FLF** by Casady & Greene [2004] and there is also an OPTI/Castcraft version: **[OPTI Respighi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131947/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=OPTI-Castcraft&ffam=OPTIRespighi%20-%20Script&fid=6f5f1e87b1b63843e71c7593e0191a7d&fsize=60&text=Harold%20H.%20Leese%20(A%20Boulton%20%26%20Sons)&wrap=2)**

PS: Be careful when using OPTI "orphan" fonts in a commercial project.  
You can read more about OPTI here:  
 [http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-27506.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131947/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-27506.html "http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-27506.html")

thanks for all the help

looks like Regency Script will suit just fine :)
